summary: This document is an email chain discussing contact information for Daniel Siad, who is described as a recruiter for Jeffrey Epstein. The email highlights a communication from Jean Luc Brunel regarding Siad's role in recruiting girls and women for Epstein.

persons.name: Amanda Framer
persons.context: Amanda Framer is the sender of the email forwarding contact information for Daniel Siad.

persons.name: Alison Folge
persons.context: Alison Folge is a recipient of the forwarded email regarding Daniel Siad.

persons.name: Alexander Miller
persons.context: Alexander Miller is included in the email chain as a recipient.

persons.name: Stan Pottinger
persons.context: Stan Pottinger is the sender of the original email discussing Daniel Siad's contact information.

persons.name: Jean Luc Brunel
persons.context: Jean Luc Brunel is mentioned as describing Daniel Siad as a recruiter for Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Daniel Siad
persons.context: Daniel Siad is identified as a recruiter of girls and women for Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Stan Pottinger forwards contact information for Daniel Siad, who is described by Jean Luc Brunel.
Jean Luc Brunel refers to Daniel Siad as a scout or recruiter for Jeffrey Epstein.
Amanda Framer forwards information to Alison Folge as part of their work.
Amanda Framer includes Alexander Miller in the email chain regarding Daniel Siad.

keyFacts: Daniel Siad is described as a recruiter for Jeffrey Epstein.
Jean Luc Brunel provided information about Daniel Siad's role.
The email chain discusses the forwarding of contact information for Daniel Siad.
